verses.text: In the seventh year of Jehu Jehoash began to reign ; and forty years reigned he in Jerusalem. And his mother’s name \add was\add* Zibiah of Beer-sheba.
And Jehoash did \add that which was\add* right in the sight of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* all his days wherein Jehoiada the priest instructed him.
But the high places were not taken away : the people still sacrificed and burnt incense in the high places. \p

¶ And Jehoash said to the priests , All the money of the dedicated things that is brought into the house of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \add even\add* the money of every one that passeth \add the account\add*, the money that every man is set at , \add and\add* all the money that cometh into any man’s heart to bring into the house of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*,  +  r 12.4  t dedicated things: or, holy things: Heb. holinesses *  +  r 12.4  t that every…: Heb. of the souls of his estimation *  +  r 12.4  t cometh…: Heb. ascendeth upon the heart of a man *
Let the priests take \add it\add* to them, every man of his acquaintance : and let them repair the breaches of the house , wheresoever any breach shall be found.
But it was \add so, that\add* in the three and twentieth year of king Jehoash the priests had not repaired the breaches of the house.\f + \fr 12.6 \ft three…: Heb. twentieth year and third year\f*

Then king Jehoash called for Jehoiada the priest , and the \add other\add* priests , and said unto them, Why repair ye not the breaches of the house ? now therefore receive no \add more\add* money of your acquaintance , but deliver it for the breaches of the house.
And the priests consented to receive no \add more\add* money of the people , neither to repair the breaches of the house.

But Jehoiada the priest took a chest , and bored a hole in the lid of it, and set it beside the altar , on the right side as one cometh into the house of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: and the priests that kept the door put therein all the money \add that was\add* brought into the house of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 12.9  t door: Heb. threshold *

And it was \add so\add*, when they saw that \add there was\add* much money in the chest , that the king’s scribe and the high priest came up , and they put up in bags , and told the money that was found in the house of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 12.10 \ft scribe: or, secretary\f*\f + \fr 12.10 \ft put…: Heb. bound up\f*

And they gave the money , being told , into the hands of them that did the work , that had the oversight of the house of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: and they laid it out to the carpenters and builders , that wrought upon the house of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*,  +  r 12.11  t laid…: Heb. brought it forth *

And to masons , and hewers of stone , and to buy timber and hewed stone to repair the breaches of the house of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and for all that was laid out for the house to repair \add it\add*.\f + \fr 12.12 \ft was…: Heb. went forth\f*

Howbeit there were not made for the house of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* bowls of silver , snuffers , basons , trumpets , any vessels of gold , or vessels of silver , of the money \add that was\add* brought into the house of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*:
But they gave that to the workmen , and repaired therewith the house of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
Moreover they reckoned not with the men , into whose hand they delivered the money to be bestowed on workmen : for they dealt faithfully.
The trespass money and sin money was not brought into the house of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: it was the priests’. \p
¶ Then Hazael king of Syria went up , and fought against Gath , and took it: and Hazael set his face to go up to Jerusalem.

And Jehoash king of Judah took all the hallowed things that Jehoshaphat , and Jehoram , and Ahaziah , his fathers , kings of Judah , had dedicated , and his own hallowed things , and all the gold \add that was\add* found in the treasures of the house of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and in the king’s house , and sent \add it\add* to Hazael king of Syria : and he went away from Jerusalem.\f + \fr 12.18 \ft went…: Heb. went up\f* \p
¶ And the rest of the acts of Joash , and all that he did , \add are\add* they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah ?
And his servants arose , and made a conspiracy , and slew Joash in the house of Millo , which goeth down to Silla.\f + \fr 12.20 \ft the house…: or, Bethmillo\f*

For Jozachar the son of Shimeath , and Jehozabad the son of Shomer , his servants , smote him, and he died ; and they buried him with his fathers in the city of David : and Amaziah his son reigned in his stead.
